Libraries importation
```{r warning=FALSE}
library(DBI)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
poesie_db <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "data/db.sqlite3")

dbListTables(poesie_db)

# Only close connection when you don't need to talk to the database anymore
# (usually toward the end of your script)

```

Let's Select the columns of the correct table.
```{r}
poetry <- tbl(poesie_db, "ecriture_poeme")
poetry
class(poetry)
```

At the end, don't forget to disconnect from the database.
```{r}
dbDisconnect(poesie_db)
```
